Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Character
    Represents the player at any given time in the current game state
    Version:
    1.0 added attributes and methods (w/out implementation)
    1.1 Implemented the constructor
    Author:
    Gursimran Randhawa, Millie Quinn, and Yassine Abdalass

        Parameters:
        name - name of the current player
        inventory - a hashmap of the players current collectables
        highestLevel - is the players highest reached level
        imageID - The image id to display.
